1584500.name: Spacey Vade
1584500.description:
Challenging emergent arcade shooting fun! Plan, time and bounce your shots, how large a combo you can score with a single shot.

Can you 100% and 3 star each level? It’s not as easy as you think!

With every pixel in each level a dynamic physics object, the emergent possibilities for each level are endless.

Features:
  • Synth-wave glitch styling
  • 42 challenging puzzle, wave and boss levels
  • 100% pixel physics
  • 100% real gameplay
  • Space unicorn that poops mines
  • Local high scores
  • Designed to be played on restored arcade cabinets
1584500.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
